name: Safari Rampage
description:
Have you ever been to the Kruger National Park?
Have you ever been to the Masai Mara?
Have you ever been to the Serengeti?

...

Experience an African safari like no other. Get to see all the wild animals in their natural habitat. Be the one in control of the game drive. Drive carefully though, some animals can be dangerous.

Developed for Ludum Dare 33

Team

Kevin Marais

Cukia Kimani

Sashen Reddy

Tim Harbour
